item.title: Trump and Putin Set to Discuss Ukraine War in High-Stakes Call
item.description: A telephone call between the two leaders would be the latest chapter in a flurry of diplomatic maneuvering over ending the three-year conflict.

item.title: Israel Announced a New Invasion of Gaza. Is It Bluffing?

item.title: UK and EU Strike Brexit Reset Deal
item.description: As leaders gathered in London for a long awaited summit, a senior British minister said his country had secured a new agreement with the bloc.

item.title: UK-EU Summit Deal: What to Know as Officials Talk Defense, Trade and More
item.description: Top officials from Britain and the European Union are gathering in London on Monday as they announce a “reset” of post-Brexit relations.

item.title: Will Trump’s Trade War Turn Canada’s Auto-Parts Capital Into a Ghost Town?
